sense.def:
To know something
pomeni nekaj imeti pravilno v zavesti.

seg.quote: I don't know her address.
I knew that she had recently graduated from law school.
We knew what to expect.
No one knew how to repair it.
‘Will they come back?’—‘I don't know.’

sense.def:
To know of something
ali
to know about something
pomeni, da smo za nekaj slišali.

seg.quote: Many people did not even know of their existence.
Claude knew about the killing.

sense.def:
To know a language
pomeni razumeti in govoriti tisti jezik.

seg.quote: Shanti knew a few words of English.

sense.def:
To know about a subject
pomeni, da smo neko snov preučili in imamo o njej nekaj znanja.

seg.quote: They knew a lot about films.
I don't know much about physics, I'm afraid.

sense.def:
To know a person, place, or thing
pomeni biti seznanjen z neko osebo, krajem ali stvarjo.

seg.quote: Do you know David?
He knew London well.

sense.def:
To let someone know about something
pomeni nekomu za tisto povedati.

seg.quote: I'll find out about the car and let you know what happened.

sense.def:
To know better than someone else
pomeni, da so naše zamisli razumnejše ali pravilnejše kot zamisli nekoga drugega.

seg.quote: The experts, who knew better, laughed at the idea.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
ought to know better
, mislimo, da bi se moral tisti človek vesti razumneje in bolj sprejemljivo.

seg.quote: Brian is old enough to know better.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da nekdo
knows best
, mislimo, da ima tisti človek vedno prav, ko reče, kako bi morali ukrepati.

seg.quote: Parents always know best.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
you know
nekaj poudarimo ali razjasnimo.

seg.quote: You were very naughty, you know.
You know, most of the time he seems like a fool.
...the old desk. You know, the one that's broken.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
I know
povemo, da se s pravkar povedanim strinjamo ali nakažemo svoje zavedanje, da je nekaj res.

seg.quote: ‘It's quite extraordinary.’—‘I know.’
I get frightened in the night sometimes—it's silly, I know.

sense.def:
Kdor je
in the know
, ima podatke o nečem, kar vedo le redki ljudje.
